content: Domenico Gaetano Maria Donizetti was an Italian composer from the Classical and Romantic eras, best known for his operas. He composed over 70 operas, many of which were very popular in his time, and is considered one of the major exponents of the bel canto style of opera. Some of his most famous works include "L'elisir d'amore," "Lucia di Lammermoor," and "Don Pasquale." He was born in 1797 and died in 1848.
